title: Handkerchief, 1897
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Frame H x W: 41.9 x 45.7 cm (16 1/2 x 18 in.)
Textile H x W: 33.7 x 36.5 cm (13 1/4 x 14 3/8 in.)
description: Ground divided into four quarters with coat of arms, and a center medallion portrait of Queen Victoria. In a banner above the medallion: "In Commemoration of the 60 Years Reign," and below the medallion: "1837 Queen Victoria 1897." Printed in black, blue, red, and yellow on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1897.
1897. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Gift of Paul F. Walter. 2008-21-2.
